DOC.brief_title: Study Association Between Maternal Uric Acid , Maternal Fetal Outcome Pregnant Women With Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: Association maternal uric acid maternal condition ( renal function , liver function , ... ect . ) fetal outcome ( birth weight , APGER score ) pregnant woman hypertension .
DOC.criteria: Age:1840 year old Gestational age:2842 week gestation singleton pregnancy live fetus Non smoker woman refuse study Any medical obstetric disorder especially D.M. , renal disease , hepatic , cardiac disorder gout arthritis , hypertension present . Previously elevate uric acid level . Hemolytic sickle cell anemia , urinary tract infection . Use diuretic antiinflammatory drug .
